function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased economic support may lead to complacency in adhering to public health guidelines, leading to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential increase in fraud due to the large-scale distribution of funds and economic support.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large financial aid packages may encourage increased public spending and economic activity, potentially leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in the community.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxed budget policies may lead to a lack of financial resources for long-term public health infrastructure and preparedness, creating vulnerability to future disease outbreaks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale financial aid aims to support businesses and affected individuals, but may inadvertently lead to economic disparities, potentially exacerbating social determinants of health and widening health inequities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cancellation and postponement of scientific conferences","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact on financial markets and global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of school closures on families and economic costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on research community","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delays in upscaling production in chemical manufacturing companies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closures of educational institutions due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral outbreak impacting global economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption to manufacturing businesses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Travel restrictions and social distancing impacting availability of inspectors and delivery staff","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shutting down of floor trading impacting commodity exchange","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low levels of animal pharmaceuticals from large drug suppliers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on global healthcare systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforced border shutdowns, travel restrictions, and quarantine","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global crash in demand for agricultural commodities","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through the handling of waste materials from households and quarantine facilities with covid-19 patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data on sars-cov-2 prevalence and persistence in wastewater, hindering informed risk management actions for the wastewater sector.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential aerosol transmission of covid-19, similar to previous outbreaks like sars-cov, necessitating further research and risk management actions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of novel rna viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential vulnerabilities in waste and wastewater management due to widespread community infection and quarantining","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown variability in sars-cov-2 viral shedding rates between people and within people at different stages of infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for inaccurate detection of sars-cov-2 re-emergence or presence/absence through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of widely-accepted surveillance system for detecting the potential community presence of covid-19 through wastewater monitoring.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible faecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unpublished data on infectious sars-cov-2 in faecal samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of wastewater ’analysis’ for monitoring covid-19 incidence","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of diseases through air vents and plumbing systems in housing complexes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater, indicating potential presence of the virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Genetic similarity of sars-cov-2 to sars-cov, and potential for faecal-oral transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in waste collection time of 72 hours","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sharing of patient data between health authorities and waste services sector","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of viral aerosols through wastewater systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Home isolation and pop-up quarantine facilities for covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dispersed nature of cases and infected individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential role of the environment in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Likelihood of additional transmission mechanisms in confined spaces with dense populations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission via fomites, aerosols, and faecal-oral route","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 on surfaces for several days","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 via contaminated objects and surfaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty around viral shedding from asymptomatic carriers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High contagiousness of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of sars-cov-2 in waste and wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of virus transmission in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the virus structure and implications for waste management","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial impacts on waste and wastewater industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improperly configured, maintained, or cleaned ventilation system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
